p:
For the current study, we begin with the disease model calibrated to the 2014-15 influenza season. Given the best fit model M
θ ⋆ , we define the optimization study scenarios as follows: A scenario is defined by a ( v, E) tuple and is derived by setting the vaccination efficacy to v in model M
θ ⋆ and calibrating the transmissibility β to achieve national attack size of E under pro rata vaccine allocation.
